H0.text: What was the capital of the Confederacy in the American Civil War. Atlanta

H1.text: What was the capital of the Confederacy in the American Civil War. Charleston

H2.text: What was the capital of the Confederacy in the American Civil War. Montgomery

H3.text: What was the capital of the Confederacy in the American Civil War. RICHMOND

A4.text: Richmond, Virginia, was chosen for the interim capital at the Virginia State Capitol.

A5.text: The Confederate capital was moved from Montgomery to Richmond, Virginia, in May 1861.
